channel.title: Rune-Evo Linux Compile Issues
channel.description:
I compiled on Windows and added the edited files: DonatorOnly.java and GrandExchange and stuff, but the commands wont work and nothing changed. When I use the compile.sh I get: FIXED IT! But now I get
./compile.sh javac: invalid flag: lib/demorpg.jar Usage: javac use -help for a list of possible options ./compile.sh: line 2: src/com/rs/game/item/FloorItem.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 3: src/com/rs/game/minigames/duel/DuelArena.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 4: src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/AbbysalTitanCombat.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 5: src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/Abyssallurker.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 6: src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/GodWarMinion.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 7: src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/CommanderZilyana.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 8: src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/KalphiteQueen.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 9: src/com/rs/game/npc/qbd/ChangeArmour.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 10: src/com/rs/game/player/actions/Action.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 11: src/com/rs/game/player/actions/thieving/PickPocketableNPC.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 12: src/com/rs/game/player/content/construction/House.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 13: src/com/rs/game/player/content/pet/PetDetails.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 14: src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/events/DeathEvent.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 15: src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/Cutscene.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 16: src/com/rs/game/player/quests/Quest.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 17: src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/ButtonHandler.java: Permission denied
I'm kind of thinking I need to CHMOD ALL of these files.

item.title: Rune-Evo Linux Compile Issues
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you already compiled on windows, you don’t need to recompile on linux, but yes, you need to give the compiler access to those files, or in another way to say it. Java needs permission to read and write for those files.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo Linux Compile Issues
item.dc:creator: @shadowrecon4 shadowrecon4
item.description:
@shadowrecon4 wrote:

I compiled on Windows and added the edited files: DonatorOnly.java and GrandExchange and stuff, but the commands wont work and nothing changed.

When I use the compile.sh I get: FIXED IT! But now I get

./compile.sh javac: invalid flag: lib/demorpg.jar Usage: javac use -help for a list of possible options ./compile.sh: line 2: src/com/rs/game/item/FloorItem.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 3: src/com/rs/game/minigames/duel/DuelArena.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 4: src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/AbbysalTitanCombat.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 5: src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/Abyssallurker.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 6: src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/GodWarMinion.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 7: src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/CommanderZilyana.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 8: src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/KalphiteQueen.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 9: src/com/rs/game/npc/qbd/ChangeArmour.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 10: src/com/rs/game/player/actions/Action.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 11: src/com/rs/game/player/actions/thieving/PickPocketableNPC.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 12: src/com/rs/game/player/content/construction/House.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 13: src/com/rs/game/player/content/pet/PetDetails.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 14: src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/events/DeathEvent.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 15: src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/Cutscene.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 16: src/com/rs/game/player/quests/Quest.java: Permission denied ./compile.sh: line 17: src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/ButtonHandler.java: Permission denied

I’m kind of thinking I need to CHMOD ALL of these files.

Read full topic
